publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4231 Ms Rosemary Byrne: Friends of Refugees Ayrshireâ€”That the Parliament congratulates Friends of the Refugees Ayrshire and supporters for maintaining regular vigils and protests at Dungavel detention centre and for their support over the years to asylum seekers and calls on the Scottish Executive to support the group in its demand to close Dungavel. Supported by: Campbell Martin*, Fiona Hyslop*, Chris Ballance*, Alex Neil*
S2M-4231 Friends of Refugees Ayrshire (lodged on 10 April 2006) Tommy Sheridan*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Frances Curran*, Rosie Kane*
S2M-4231 Friends of Refugees Ayrshire (lodged on 10 April 2006) Dr Jean Turner*
